name: AWSWAFXssMatchSetXssMatchTupleFieldToMatch
description: FieldToMatch is a property of the AWS WAF XssMatchSet XssMatchTuple property that specifies the part of a web request that you want AWS WAF to search, such as a specific header or a query string.

properties.name: Data
properties.description: If you specify HEADER for the Type property, the name of the header that AWS WAF searches for, such as User-Agent or Referer. If you specify any other value for the Type property, do not specify this property.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The part of the web request in which AWS WAF searches for the target string. For valid values, see FieldToMatch in the AWS WAF API Reference.
